content.question: The National Organization for Women (NOW) was founded in 1966 in order to

choices.label: encourage women to believe in the “feminine mystique”
challenge sex discrimination in the workplace
oppose the proposed Equal Rights Amendment
advocate restrictions on access to abortion
advocate equal access for women to athletic facilities

content.answer: challenge sex discrimination in the workplace

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
